prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a gentle giant with vibrant flowers growing on it.
I want a grass-type Pokemon that looks like a giant plant with a friendly face.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by a lush garden with soft green hues and floral accents.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that embodies tranquility and nature with a floral design.
Imagine a healing Pokemon that blends seamlessly with its green surroundings, exuding kindness.
Design a Pokemon that has a round body, a flower on its back, and a serene expression.
Show me a creature that represents growth and harmony, with a lush green appearance.
